title: Water: friend or enemy
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and United States Information Service
brief_description: A delightful yet educational animation which shows all benefits of water to human kind, then shows how drinking water must be stored (eg in a well), specially designed so that we don’t get contaminated water. Aimed at children to educate on water preservation and general hygiene with drinking water.
